attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My wife had a still birth a few days ago and according to the law there is no rights for registration, as if the child did not exist. that child did he was a baby who was formed and to us he was our child and no one can change that. When we went to the hospital our baby was still beating but they did not do anything to try and save our baby as the amneotic sack had broken

we need help to rectify the law so that this can be acknowleged that people that have sufferd like us have the right to register and people to acknowlege their child. why shoul we have to suffer the pain and there be no records to prove that children like ours dont exist please help us change this.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Acknowlede still birth from 20 weeks."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21781


Prime Minister's Office
